name: Bulletia: Buns V Guns
description:
You are a space dude with the Bulletrhea syndrome, you were hired  to protect the nasa spaceship sent to make a base on the moon. You must fight through waves of fighting evil russian communist astronauts who want to destroy the ship, enjoy!

The red rope tells you where the nearest enemy is while the green line tells you where the nearest powerup is, the grey line tells you where the ghost is. It's best to play in full screen mode.

This was made for the 2021 Bullet Hell Jam
